comment.author: 65431427@N02
comment._content: The leading officer could well be Ferdinand Foch. See also on the following pic, standing in the middle: www.flickr.com/photos/kclibrary/3657737908/

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: nemena98: Looks like the officer in the middle could be General Ferdinand Foch, though the photo is not too clear. There are alot of photos of Foch in the Bain News Service Collection. Here is one: www.loc.gov/pictures/resource/ggbain.17451/ We will add his name to the description with "probably" until more information turns up. Thank you!
